comment.body:
Even after being logged into the Netgear Orbi app (by disabling AG), with AG enabled, when I go into 'Account Management' in the Orbi application, I get an error "You are not connected to the internet. Check your internet connection.."
I have to go into the Account Management section to logout to continue testing what in AG is blocking access.

I tried disabling Stealth Mode in AG - no change.
I went into DNS Filtering and disabled DNS Requests blocking - no change
I've set DNS to Cloudflare and Cloudflare for Families (thus bypassing my local Adguard Home DNS) - no change
I've tried disabling individual groups of filters - Ad Blocking, Privacy, Security, Annoyances, Custom, as well as turning them all off at the same time, but nothing unblocks accessing the Netgear account management or login/logoff pages.

As soon as I disable AG, I can get into the Account Management section and login and logout.

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: howtowriteabookthatsells.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://howtowriteabookthatsells.com/how-to-copyright-a-pen-name/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhowtowriteabookthatsells.com%2Fhow-to-copyright-a-pen-name%2F) ### Comment > This annoyance is so rife on the internet, I beg you to do something in AdGuard to curb it. When moving your mouse cursor away from the page, perhaps towards one's browser toolbar, a desperate pop-up appears begging you not to leave. Adguard is powerless against this because they use a javascript lightbox to darken the page and their message sits on top of it. If you use AdGuard to suppress the message (elements) the lightbox element remains. Then you cannot suppress it or interact with the page anymore. So frustrating! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/CJyfUzx.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.6 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
